about.bio: I am a journalist specialized in human narratives and social analysis. My work focuses on exploring the complex realities of our contemporary society through written word and documentary imagery. Trained at the Complutense University of Madrid, I have developed my career combining rigorous research with an ethical and empathetic approach to the stories I tell.

photography.intro: Documentary photography allows me to capture moments that reflect social and human reality. Each image tells a story, documents an instant of truth that deserves to be preserved and shared.

reports.title: Guitarricadelafuente: "Internationally, we are living a moment when Spanish is cool"
reports.summary: Interview with the Castellón singer-songwriter about his album "Spanish Leather", renewed folk and the international moment of Spanish music. From his beginnings with covers to viralizing contemporary folk.

reports.title: Teo Lucadamo: "I have made songs to find my own path, I never wanted to be associated with my mother's career"
reports.summary: Interview with the musician about his independent career and his search for his own identity away from family comparisons.

reports.title: The Delicias fire in images
reports.summary: Photo reportage of the fire on Párroco Eusebio Cuenca street, in the Delicias Espacio and Railway Museum area of Madrid.

reports.title: Víctor Conde steps down as general director of AMKT
reports.summary: During the National Marketing Awards gala, Víctor Conde announced he is leaving the general director position after 11 years to lead the I International Marketing Meeting and institutional relations with Latin America.

reports.title: A Palestinian woman embraces the body of her niece, World Press Photo winner of the year
reports.summary: Coverage of the winning image of the World Press Photo that portrays the conflict in Palestine through an embrace between a woman and her niece's body.

reports.title: Work absenteeism, a national problem
reports.summary: Analysis of work absenteeism in Spain and its impact on the business sector and economy.

reports.title: Advertising investment grows during the first half of 2024
reports.summary: Report on the evolution of the Spanish advertising market and the growth of investment in the first half of the year.

reports.title: Paul Thin: "To this day people still think El Triunfito is less of a musician and that's completely false"
reports.summary: Interview with musician Paul Thin about the perception of El Triunfito and the valuation of talent in the Spanish music industry.

reports.title: Eugenio Recuenco: "Financial markets completely destroy the essence of art"
reports.summary: Interview with the photographer and filmmaker about his 365º work, the "One Thousand and One Nights" project, and the relationship between art, market and precariousness in artistic creation.

reports.title: Samuel Nacar, World Press Photo winner: "Society implies at least 15 years of precariousness for photojournalists and journalists before people trust them"
reports.summary: Interview with the photojournalist about his World Press Photo 2025 winning reportage "The shadows now have a name", which gives visibility to survivors of Syrian prisons after the fall of Bashar al-Assad.

reports.title: The monitors or education outside the classroom
reports.summary: Report on the reality of canteen and extracurricular activity monitors: poorly trained, underpaid and with a responsibility that goes beyond mere supervision. Their invisible influence on children's development.

reports.title: Natos y Waor: decalogue of how to take underground music to the top
reports.summary: Chronicle of Natos y Waor's concert at a packed Metropolitano Stadium, a new chapter in the history of Spanish rap with Fer and Gonzalo as protagonists.

reports.title: Israel B: one man alone with a whole army in Madrid
reports.summary: Chronicle of Israel B's concert in Madrid, where the artist demonstrated his ability to fill the stage with his solo presence.

reports.title: Twenty years and a concert for posterity: Pignoise fills and moves the Movistar Arena on their anniversary tour
reports.summary: Chronicle of Pignoise's anniversary concert at the Movistar Arena: two decades of music, collaborations with Hens, Taburete, Rulo, Los Secretos, Loquillo and Hombres G, and a night of nostalgia and euphoria.

reports.title: Natos y Waor: "We would tell those Fer and Gonzalo from 15 years ago to make all the mistakes they have to make"
reports.summary: Press conference before the Metropolitano concert. The Madrid duo looks back at their beginnings in a squat in Embajadores, their 15 years in music and the advice they would give their younger selves.

work.description: Digital editing of the newspaper, specifically in its "Current Affairs" section. I have written news articles covering all its sections: Society, Politics, Science, Economy, and Lotteries. I have also conducted interviews with various personalities, mainly from social media and music. Some of these include professional photographers Eugenio Recuenco and Samuel Nacar (the latter winner of a World Press Photo); or singers and artists Teo Lucadamo and Guitarricadelafuente.

Contributor, editor, chronicler and photographer for the digital newspaper El Generacional. I write for various sections of the media, cover and photograph events. I also manage social media content for its different profiles. Notable events covered: ElRow Town Madrid 2024, Time Warp Festival 2024, Red Bull Batalla International Final 2024, various concerts in venues and stadiums such as La Riviera or Movistar Arena, among others.

Digital editing of the newspaper, management and updating of the media database. I have written about all topics and sections offered by the media: from media and health to appointments and agencies. Notable events covered: National Marketing Awards Gala 2024.
Own podcast. Content creation, participation and social media management for the media outlet El Arco, present on TikTok, Spotify, Instagram, Youtube and X (+1000 total followers) @elarcopod.

Since 2018, I have worked on organizational tasks and audiovisual content creation on social media for the Youtube channel specialized in Hard Enduro, EnduroDesinquieto (@Endurodesinquieto). I have recorded audiovisual material for the media's videos, and have carried out photographic reports and interviews adapted to their sports sector.
